channel.title: Authors on Ted Carlson's Data Blog
channel.description: Recent content in Authors on Ted Carlson's Data Blog

item.description: Ted Carlson is a data scientist in Madison, Wisconsin with an M.S. in Analytics from Northwestern University. Data is at the center of the contemporary discourse and he aspires to be an active participant in these conversations by observing, collecting and analyzing the data around him. He is delighted to share his projects in an accessible way with his audience.
